techmeme.title: A website for cybercriminals lists 500+ allegedly stolen Snowflake customer credentials, including for environments belonging to Santander and Ticketmaster (Zack Whittaker/TechCrunch)
US VC firms are putting pressure on tech startups to ask their Chinese backers to divest as VCs anticipate tighter controls on foreign ownership from Washington (Eleanor Olcott/Financial Times)
Boston-based Seven AI, which uses AI to help companies combat cyberattacks, emerged from stealth and raised $36M led by Greylock at a ~$100M valuation (Wall Street Journal)
Life360, owner of Bluetooth tracking device brand Tile, held onto its $27 per share offer price on its Nasdaq debut, after raising $155.3M in its US IPO (Amy Or/Bloomberg)
TikTok is testing a streaks feature, which has become a status symbol on Snapchat, with select users in limited markets in order to increase engagement (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
